span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 秘密潜入： to enter or take up positions in gradually or surreptitiously, as for purposes of espionage or takeover
【例】 The intelligence staff had been infiltrated by spies. 情报工作人员已经被间谍渗透了
【近】 creep, insinuate, penetrate, sneak, slip
【反】 abscond 潜逃
【派】 infiltration n. 潜入，渗透

【记】 in 进去 + filter 过滤→通过过滤器进去→渗透
【另】 filter 过滤，过滤器
